import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react'; import "./Card.scss" const Card = (props) => { const [arr, setArr] = useState([]); const containerRef = useRef(null); const [scrollPosition, setScrollPosition] = useState(0); function handleScroll(event) { const [arr, setArr] = useState([]); const containerRef = useRef(null); const scrollPositionRef = useRef(0); function handleScroll(event) { const { scrollTop, clientHeight, scrollHeight } = event.target; // Проверка, достигнут ли верх контейнера if (scrollTop === 0) { containerRef.current.scrollBy(0, -400); scrollPositionRef.current -= 400; } // Проверка, достигнут ли конец контейнера else if (scrollTop + clientHeight === scrollHeight) { containerRef.current.scrollBy(0, 400); scrollPositionRef.current += 400; } } } return (
